name: Solar Farm
uniques: [+2 Production] <in cities with a [Orbital Solar Reflector]>
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+5 Gold]

civilopediaText.text: Vast arrays of solar panels absorbing the sun's rays for energy, and occasionally as a backup information network.
